Hi International Students of Dong Hwa University!

Ever thought about starting a business in Taiwan but donâ€™t know where to begin? 
Donâ€™t miss this invaluable sharing session with successful foreign entrepreneurs in Taiwan!

On the first day of the 2024 Meet Pacific Startups Festival, 9/27 (Fri.), we have:

ğŸ”¸ Elias Ek
A pro with 24 years of entrepreneurial experience, co-founder of Enspyre, author of "How to Start a Business in Taiwan," and co-organizer of Dragonsâ€™ Chamber (Taiwanâ€™s only pitch event for immigrant entrepreneurs). Heâ€™ll cover setting up a business, visa issues, hiring, networking, fundraising, and building credit with banks.

ğŸ”¸ Mohammed Thangameeran Shaik Ismail
An Indian entrepreneur who studied in Hualien, co-founder of Pirate Coffee, and a graduate of Tzu Chi Universityâ€™s Institute of Medical Sciences. He will share his journey and challenges in starting a business in Taiwan.

Whether you're ready to start your business or just curious about the journey of seasoned entrepreneurs, click the registration link(https://bnext.surveycake.biz/s/v2v96)! Seats are limited, so don't miss out!
